EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Consultant Services Email - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Dan, Sure thing! Sara From: Dan Belanger [mailto:dan@beltechgroupinc.com] Sent: Thursday, June 21, 2012 5:47 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners / Dan Belanger Sara, thanks for that. Ive signed up. From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Thursday, June 21, 2012 3:04 PM To: dan@beltechgroupinc.com <mailto:dan@beltechgroupinc.com> Subject: MBO Partners / Dan Belanger Dear Dan, We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to follow up and get an update from you. We also are now publishing an Independent Consulting Brief. It's a monthly email that provides access to a convenient list of relevant resources, tools and best practices. You can sign up for it by going to http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief>. Feel free to provide an update by simply replying to this email. Regards, Sara___________________________________Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6081e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0yNDYmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTI0NiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODgzMjImc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4NjQyMDImZW1haWxpZD1kYW5AYmVsdGVjaGdyb3VwaW5jLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMjAwMjYtMTE2NjY0OS0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRons67JZKXonjHpfsX56uorX6O%2FlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsFrI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D></html
